### New Release

Spark is now available in Public Preview for Copilot Enterprise customers, including Enterprise Managed Users (EMU) CE users! To get started, organization admins can enable Spark for their teams. For more details, check out the [changelog](https://github.blog/changelog/2025-09-30-github-spark-in-public-preview-for-copilot-enterprise-subscribers).

### Notable Fixes

We‚Äôve addressed several issues to provide a smoother and more performant experience, including:

- Fixed an issue where submitting a prompt on the home page could cause an infinite spinner.
- Enhanced the ‚ÄúIteration History‚Äù view with faster loading and more reliable restore functionality.
- Resolved build errors that previously prevented overlays from dismissing in the workbench.
- Improved reliability for publishing Spark apps, reducing timeouts for preview and user deployments.

### Try out these improvements today

Visit [github.com/spark](https://github.com/spark) to build your next app.

*Disclaimer: The UI for features in public preview is subject to change.*
